title: How the heck do I change my video settings from outside of the game???
body: I screwed up my video settings, and even after a fresh install I'm getting bugsplat... :-CCCCC

replies.body: i just fixed this problem as i also screwed up my video settings in game. what i did was >> Go into your Riot Games folder > Config > game.cfg >> and on the allow windowsmode set a 1 and then change resolutions when you try to open the game.

I don't recommend modifying game files as it could cause more trouble than fix.  There may be a few reasons for this bugsplat, like outdated drivers.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a series of instructions to get this fixed up.  If a repair is necessary, you can download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically clean install your client.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Sry rito, already had run repair, and I knew it wasnt drivers, so I fixed the settings through the files. Side note, there should really be a better fix for that issue. :-/

Go into your Riot Games folder > Config > game.cfg

You can change your screen res, your quality settings etc from here manually.
